Display DOI infobox and stores several data items about DOI in the semantic model
</noinclude><includeonly>
{{#doiinfobox: {{{doi|}}} }}
{{#set: DOI={{{doi|}}} }}
{{#arraymap:{{#doidata: doi={{{doi|}}}|property=author}}|,|x|[[Author::x| ]]|\s}}
[[Publication date::{{#doidata: doi={{{doi|}}}|property=publicationDate}}| ]]
[[Journal::{{#doidata: doi={{{doi|}}}|property=publisher}}| ]]
</includeonly>
